whyCancel.question: Why was my subscription cancelled?
whyCancel.answer: Subscriptions can be cancelled for various reasons: you chose to cancel during the payment process, there was a payment issue, or you closed the payment window. No worries - you can try again anytime!

security.question: Is my payment information secure?
security.answer: Absolutely! We use PayPal's secure payment processing system. We never store your credit card information on our servers. All payments are processed through PayPal's encrypted and PCI-compliant infrastructure.

support.question: Need help with your subscription?
support.answer: If you're having trouble with the subscription process or have any questions, please contact our support team. We're here to help you get set up with the perfect plan for your needs.

questions.question: What happens if I exceed my daily limit?
questions.answer: If you exceed your daily limit of 500 requests, you'll need to wait until the next day or upgrade to a higher plan.

questions.question: Can I cancel my subscription anytime?
questions.answer: Yes, you can cancel your subscription at any time. You'll continue to have access until the end of your billing period.

questions.question: What's the difference between monthly and yearly plans?
questions.answer: The yearly plan offers a 20% discount compared to monthly billing, essentially giving you 2 months free.

questions.question: Is there a free trial?
questions.answer: We offer limited free access for testing. Sign up to try our API with basic limits.

questions.question: What payment methods do you accept?
questions.answer: We accept all major credit cards, PayPal, and other payment methods through our secure payment processor.
